Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Design/Decorating
Status: New Series
Network: five ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: September 24, 2012

Classic Car Rescue follows Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione as they look around scrapheaps, wastelands and back yards to look classic cars that are in need of restoration. They also find out about the stories behind the vehicles and discover why they occupy an important place in history.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-32794)
I'm kinda partial to classic american cars but jaguars are great cars too so I will check it out. thanks for the upload.
